review: I haven't had any problems, the Amazon Fire TV Stick has worked great so far.
author: Richard Enlow

review: Very easy to use and very fast to start up. Streaming quality is pretty good and there is very little buffering if any. I definitely recommend.
author: Paige Hembree

review: smooth, simple. beautiful product overall. love it!
author: Kathleen P.

review: Video was extremely choppy regardless of settings or network.  Chrome cast on same network and HDMI port worked fine.  Returned fire stick.
author: Scott U.

review: Live my firestick. Best decision I made was discontinuing my cable and purchasing this device.
author: LatashaDenise

review: Just as advertised. Plug and play. Love it!!
author: John Sachs "kihei7"

review: I can only tell you one thing; you will not regret the purchase of this Amazon item! It's easy to install and activate and you're off to the races (movies.) I DO NOT know how they can produce technology this good for such a reasonable price. P.S. I love my Echo, too!
author: todrox "todrox"
